dual_auth_delete_enabled.name: dual_auth_delete_enabled
dual_auth_delete_enabled.description: If set to true, Key Protect enables a dual authorization policy on the instance. Note: Once the dual authorization policy is set on the instance, it cannot be reverted. An instance with dual authorization policy enabled cannot be destroyed using Terraform.

key_create_import_access_enabled.name: key_create_import_access_enabled
key_create_import_access_enabled.description: If set to true, Key Protect enables a key create import access policy on the instance

key_create_import_access_settings.name: key_create_import_access_settings
key_create_import_access_settings.type:
object({
    create_root_key     = optional(bool, true)
    create_standard_key = optional(bool, true)
    import_root_key     = optional(bool, true)
    import_standard_key = optional(bool, true)
    enforce_token       = optional(bool, false)
  })
key_create_import_access_settings.description: Key create import access policy settings to configure if var.enable_key_create_import_access_policy is true. For more info see https://cloud.ibm.com/docs/key-protect?topic=key-protect-manage-keyCreateImportAccess

key_protect_name.name: key_protect_name
key_protect_name.description: The name to give the Key Protect instance that will be provisioned

metrics_enabled.name: metrics_enabled
metrics_enabled.description: If set to true, Key Protect enables metrics on the Key Protect instance. In order to view metrics, you will need a Monitoring (Sysdig) instance that is located in the same region as the Key Protect instance. Once you provision the Monitoring instance, you will need to enable platform metrics.

plan.name: plan
plan.description: Plan for the Key Protect instance. Currently only 'tiered-pricing' is supported

region.name: region
region.description: Region where the Key Protect instance will be provisioned

resource_group_id.name: resource_group_id
resource_group_id.description: Resource Group ID where the Key Protect instance will be provisioned

rotation_enabled.name: rotation_enabled
rotation_enabled.description: If set to true, Key Protect enables a rotation policy on the Key Protect instance.

rotation_interval_month.name: rotation_interval_month
rotation_interval_month.description: Specifies the key rotation time interval in months. Must be between 1 and 12 inclusive.

service_endpoints.name: service_endpoints
service_endpoints.description: Types of the service endpoints to be set for the Key Protect instance. Possible values are 'public', 'private', or 'public-and-private'

tags.name: tags
tags.description: List of tags to associate with the Key Protect instance

key_protect_guid.name: key_protect_guid
key_protect_guid.description: GUID of the Key Protect instance

key_protect_id.name: key_protect_id
key_protect_id.description: ID of the Key Protect instance

key_protect_instance_policies.name: key_protect_instance_policies
key_protect_instance_policies.description: Instance Polices of the Key Protect instance

key_protect_name.name: key_protect_name
key_protect_name.description: Name of the Key Protect instance
